actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend the duty on railroad and railway rolling stock exported for repairs or alterations on or before August 31, 1975.

summary.text: Suspends the import duty under the Tariff Schedules on railroad and railway rolling stock exported for repairs or alterations on or before August 31, 1975. Makes such suspension retroactive, upon request, to October 1, 1974.

titles.title: A bill to suspend the duty on railroad and railway rolling stock exported for repairs or alterations on or before August 31, 1975.
